mapper.update: update t_data set data_index = #{dataIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media_urls = #{mediaUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standard_answer = #{standardAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, data_index, `type`, score, comp_id, media_urls, standard_answer from t_data
